body:
$ldd ./rustc
    linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007fff09cfe000)
    libnative-4e7c5e5c.so => not found
    librustc-4e7c5e5c.so => not found
    librustrt-4e7c5e5c.so => not found
    libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00007f5111a10000)
    /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x0000003475200000)
then I change ~/.bashrc
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}:/usr/local/lib/

$ldd ./rustc
    linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007fffe794a000)
    libnative-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libnative-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f22a32000)
    librustc-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/librustc-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f217b4000)
    librustrt-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/librustrt-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f2143f000)
    libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00007f2f21096000)
    libstd-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libstd-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f20c7a000)
    libsync-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libsync-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f209e0000)
    libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007f2f207c3000)
    libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib64/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007f2f205ac000)
    /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x0000003475200000)
    librustc_back-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/librustc_back-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f20368000)
    librbml-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/librbml-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f20133000)
    libgetopts-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libgetopts-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1ff0e000)
    libgraphviz-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libgraphviz-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1fd02000)
    libsyntax-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libsyntax-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1f455000)
    libarena-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libarena-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1f246000)
    libdebug-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libdebug-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1f027000)
    libtime-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libtime-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1ee11000)
    libserialize-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libserialize-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1eb4d000)
    libflate-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libflate-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1e944000)
    librustc_llvm-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/librustc_llvm-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1c7c0000)
    liblog-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/liblog-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1c5af000)
    libdl.so.2 => /lib64/libdl.so.2 (0x00007f2f1c3ab000)
    libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00007f2f1c127000)
    libterm-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libterm-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1bedf000)
    libfmt_macros-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libfmt_macros-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1bccf000)
    librt.so.1 => /lib64/librt.so.1 (0x00007f2f1bac6000)
    libregex-4e7c5e5c.so => /usr/local/lib/libregex-4e7c5e5c.so (0x00007f2f1b87d000)

$rustc
Usage: rustc [OPTIONS] INPUT 
......
Additional help:
    -C help             Print codegen options
    -W help             Print 'lint' options and default settings
    -Z help             Print internal options for debugging rustc

It looks like you discovered the need for `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`, which is the current recommended way of installing rust (you can add that to your .bashrc equivalent).

Closing for now!
